name: Startup India Seed Fund
description: Government of India fund to support innovative startups in the country
eligibility_summary: Must be incorporated as a private limited company; registered as a startup; less than 5 years old; not funded more than ₹10 lakh in any previous scheme

name: DSIR Early Stage Innovation Fund
description: Department of Scientific and Industrial Research fund for early stage deep tech innovation
eligibility_summary: Can be individual researchers or teams; working on scientific/industrial research; not yet commercialized

description: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade fund for technology-driven startups
eligibility_summary: Innovative technology startups; less than 7 years old; tech-focused business model

name: National Science Olympiad Grant
description: Support for young innovators participating in science competitions
eligibility_summary: Students/young researchers with innovative ideas; science/tech background

name: NASSCOM 10000 Startups

eligibility_summary: Registered startup; working on innovative business model; based in India

description: Low-interest loans from Small Industries Development Bank for startups

ministry: Ministry of Micro Small Medium Enterprises

name: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana

eligibility_summary: Business plan ready; no existing loan; genuine business case
